snippet: At campaign appearances, no one would ever guess that John A. Catsimatidis, a Republican, was the billionaire in the room, but he has run this year’s most idiosyncratic race for New York City mayor.
abstract: Billionaire Republican candidate John A Catsimatidis is running the most idiosyncratic race for New York City mayor; is unfettered by the constraints, on spending, on rhetoric, or on imagination, that have dulled actions and utterances of other candidates; says he is running because he wants to 'give back' to city where he made his fortune, which he amassed from his ownership of Gristedes supermarket chain (Series: In The Running).
lead_paragraph: At campaign appearances, no one would ever guess that John A. Catsimatidis, a Republican, was the billionaire in the room, but he has run this year’s most idiosyncratic race for New York City mayor.

headline.main: Catsimatidis Campaigns With Heart, Tongue and Checkbook Unfettered
headline.print_headline: Campaign Plan: Free Thinking, Freer Spending
